title: Install provisioning package
description: Generates a provisioning package and installs it on the virtual machine.

applicationId.description: The identifier for the Azure Active Directory used to access Key Vault.

namePrefix.description: The prefix for the DNS computer name that will be assigned to the virtual machine.

tenant.description: The identifier for the Azure Active Directory application where the virtual machine will be registered.

vaultName.description: The name for the instance of Azure Key Vault.

vaultSecret.description: The secret for the Azure Active Directory application that will be used to access Key Vault.

vaultTenant.description: The identifier for the Azure Active Directory tenant that will be used to access Key Vault.

runCommand.commandToExecute: [concat('powershell.exe -ExecutionPolicy bypass "& ./InstallProvisioningPackage.ps1 -ApplicationId ', parameters('applicationId'), ' -NamePrefix ', parameters('namePrefix'), ' -Tenant ', parameters('tenant'), ' -VaultName ', parameters('vaultName'), ' -VaultSecret ', parameters('vaultSecret'), ' -VaultTenant ', parameters('vaultTenant'), '"')]
